Description: Textile fragment; torn strip of undyed linen cloth (mummy-wrapping); deterioration of edges due to contact with black bitumen(?). Edges torn - one end is partly cut. Worn. The weave is plain [warp-faced simple tabby] and the threads are S-spun and S-spliced; the stitch gauge is warp c.25 ends per 10mm and weft c.12 picks per 10mm.
Curator's comments: Proabably from the same cloth , or at least from the same mummy as BM 6547 - 6551 + 6553. Information from Hero Granger-Taylor [1993]
